subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tommy Haas of Germany, ranked 18th in the world, could be sidelined from the ATP Tour for up to six months after having surgery on his right hip, the German newspaper Bild reported.
snippet: Tommy Haas of Germany, ranked 18th in the world, could be sidelined from the ATP Tour for up to six months after having surgery on his right hip, the German newspaper Bild reported.
